Text: This game I can recommend heartily. I even advice you to buy it, if possible, since the company which made it, Sir Tech, has been in financial trouble ever since Jagged Alliance I. Still they make such great and finished games.

"Still they make..."?  Obviusly you're not updated. They havent produced a line of code since october 2003, simply because of financial problems.

http://www.sir-tech.com/news/index.html

any seeders please?

this is such a great game and as i hope to move from Windows to Linux it would be cool to take an old favoutite with me

thanks
I would like to have this game on Linux, but someone must seed it!
